name: Quatris
description:
One simple twist on a timeless classic: you're playing two games at once! Blue and orange pieces move on separate planes, slipping past each other to fit or block in surprising ways. Even after hours of playing, you will find new ways to achieve your perfect fits.

Quatris features six separate game modes, each with their own subtly different mechanics, that you will need to master independently. Can you enter the high scores in each mode?

Quatris features 12 achievements and three unlockable visual themes.
